alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:35PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A LINE OF STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN SOMERSET AND NORTHERN ACCOMACK COUNTIES... At 734 PM EDT, radar indicated strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Deal Island to 8 miles northwest of Tylerton to 7 miles north of Fair Port. Movement was east at 45 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail are possible with these storms. Locations impacted include... Tangier, Lawsonia, Westover, Deal Island, Marion Station, Tylerton, West Pocomoke, Saxis, Byrdtown, Fairmount, Upper Hill, Smith Island, Hopewell, Rehobeth, Kingston, Shelltown, Sanford, Manokin, Upper Fairmount and New Church. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They can relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Wakefield.
